name: Action Inbox
description: "I wish I could see all of the calls to action from orgs I support in one app/dashboard rather than as dozens of separate emails."

name: HillaryBNB
description: We want to build an app to allow supporters to share their homes with others from out of town and to help supporters on the road find lodging.

name: Nomad
description: Nomad is a web app for arranging long-distance carpools for supporters and activists, which was used to great success during the Hillary 2016 campaign.
